level.text: A veterinarian shall keep on a daily basis a written report of the animals he or she treats. The record shall include pertinent medical data such as dates and type of vaccinations and all relevant medical and surgical procedures.
A veterinarian shall keep the records required by this section for a period of three (3) years following the last office visit or discharge of such animal from the animal facility.
A veterinarian shall comply with the record keeping requirements for drugs specified in ยง2814.
